parameters.jsCode:
// üîç ENTERPRISE INPUT VALIDATION & PREPROCESSING
const inputData = $input.first().json;
const config = $('üè¢ Enterprise Configuration').first().json;
const executionId = $execution.id;
const timestamp = new Date().toISOString();

console.log('üè¢ Enterprise Cross-Platform Publishing Started', {
  executionId,
  contentId: inputData.contentId,
  platforms: inputData.platforms,
  publishType: inputData.publishType,
  timestamp
});

// Enterprise-grade validation
if (!inputData.content || !inputData.platforms || inputData.platforms.length === 0) {
  throw new Error('‚ùå Enterprise Validation Failed: Missing required fields - content and platforms');
}

if (!inputData.content.text && (!inputData.content.mediaUrls || inputData.content.mediaUrls.length === 0)) {
  throw new Error('‚ùå Enterprise Validation Failed: Content must have either text or media');
}

// Enterprise platform configuration with Blotato account IDs
const enterprisePlatformConfig = {
  instagram: {
    accountId: "1687",
    priority: 1,
    maxRetries: 5,
    retryDelay: 3000,
    characterLimit: 2200,
    hashtagLimit: 30,
    fallbacks: ['threads', 'facebook'],
    rateLimitPerHour: 25,
    optimalPostTimes: ['14:00', '17:00', '20:00'],
    contentOptimization: true,
    requiresApproval: inputData.requiresApproval || false
  },
  facebook: {
    accountId: "1759",
    pageId: "101603614680195",
    priority: 2,
    maxRetries: 4,
    retryDelay: 2500,
    characterLimit: 63206,
    hashtagLimit: 0,
    fallbacks: ['linkedin', 'twitter'],
    rateLimitPerHour: 50,
    optimalPostTimes: ['09:00', '13:00', '15:00'],
    contentOptimization: true,
    requiresApproval: inputData.requiresApproval || false
  },
  twitter: {
    accountId: "1289",
    priority: 1,
    maxRetries: 6,
    retryDelay: 1500,
    characterLimit: 280,
    hashtagLimit: 2,
    fallbacks: ['threads', 'linkedin'],
    rateLimitPerHour: 100,
    optimalPostTimes: ['09:00', '12:00', '17:00', '21:00'],
    contentOptimization: true,
    requiresApproval: inputData.requiresApproval || false
  },
  linkedin: {
    accountId: "1446",
    priority: 2,
    maxRetries: 4,
    retryDelay: 3500,
    characterLimit: 3000,
    hashtagLimit: 3,
    fallbacks: ['twitter', 'facebook'],
    rateLimitPerHour: 30,
    optimalPostTimes: ['08:00', '12:00', '17:00'],
    contentOptimization: true,
    requiresApproval: inputData.requiresApproval || true
  },
  tiktok: {
    accountId: "2079",
    priority: 3,
    maxRetries: 3,
    retryDelay: 8000,
    characterLimit: 4000,
    hashtagLimit: 100,
    fallbacks: ['instagram', 'youtube'],
    rateLimitPerHour: 15,
    optimalPostTimes: ['19:00', '21:00'],
    contentOptimization: true,
    requiresApproval: inputData.requiresApproval || true
  },
  youtube: {
    accountId: "873",
    priority: 3,
    maxRetries: 3,
    retryDelay: 12000,
    characterLimit: 5000,
    hashtagLimit: 15,
    fallbacks: ['facebook', 'linkedin'],
    rateLimitPerHour: 10,
    optimalPostTimes: ['18:00', '20:00'],
    contentOptimization: true,
    requiresApproval: inputData.requiresApproval || true
  },
  threads: {
    accountId: "507",
    priority: 1,
    maxRetries: 5,
    retryDelay: 2000,
    characterLimit: 500,
    hashtagLimit: 30,
    fallbacks: ['twitter', 'instagram'],
    rateLimitPerHour: 40,
    optimalPostTimes: ['10:00', '14:00', '18:00'],
    contentOptimization: true,
    requiresApproval: inputData.requiresApproval || false
  },
  pinterest: {
    accountId: "363",
    boardId: "1146658823815436667",
    priority: 4,
    maxRetries: 3,
    retryDelay: 6000,
    characterLimit: 500,
    hashtagLimit: 20,
    fallbacks: ['instagram', 'facebook'],
    rateLimitPerHour: 20,
    optimalPostTimes: ['11:00', '15:00', '20:00'],
    contentOptimization: true,
    requiresApproval: inputData.requiresApproval || false
  }
};

// Enterprise processing metadata
const enterpriseMetadata = {
  requestId: inputData.requestId || `ent_pub_${Date.now()}_${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`,
  executionId,
  contentId: inputData.contentId || `content_${Date.now()}`,
  publishType: inputData.publishType || 'immediate',
  scheduledTime: inputData.scheduledTime,
  platforms: inputData.platforms,
  publishingStrategy: inputData.publishingStrategy || 'intelligent_parallel',
  fallbackEnabled: inputData.fallbackEnabled !== false,
  approvalRequired: inputData.requiresApproval || false,
  priority: inputData.priority || 'standard',
  source: inputData.source || 'api',
  userId: inputData.userId,
  organizationId: inputData.organizationId,
  campaignId: inputData.campaignId,
  workflowVersion: '2.0_enterprise',
  startTime: timestamp,
  compliance: {
    gdprCompliant: true,
    auditTrail: true,
    dataRetention: '7_years'
  }
};

console.log('‚úÖ Enterprise validation completed', {
  requestId: enterpriseMetadata.requestId,
  platformCount: inputData.platforms.length,
  strategy: enterpriseMetadata.publishingStrategy
});

return [{ 
  json: {
    ...enterpriseMetadata,
    originalContent: inputData.content,
    enterprisePlatformConfig,
    processingStage: 'validated',
    config
  }
}];

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "event": "cross_platform_publishing_complete",
  "data": {
    "requestId": "{{ $json.requestId }}",
    "executionId": "{{ $json.executionId }}",
    "contentId": "{{ $json.contentId }}",
    "platforms": {{ JSON.stringify($json.platforms) }},
    "publishingStrategy": "{{ $json.publishingStrategy }}",
    "totalPlatforms": {{ $json.platforms.length }},
    "successfulPlatforms": {{ $json.platforms.length - ($json.failedPlatforms?.length || 0) }},
    "failedPlatforms": {{ $json.failedPlatforms?.length || 0 }},
    "fallbacksUsed": {{ $json.fallbacksUsed || 0 }},
    "totalProcessingTime": "{{ Date.now() - new Date($json.startTime).getTime() }}ms",
    "aiOptimizations": {{ $json.optimizationInsights?.totalOptimizations || 0 }},
    "dashboardUrl": "{{ $('üè¢ Enterprise Configuration').first().json.DASHBOARD_URL }}/[locale]/workflows/cross-platform?request={{ $json.requestId }}",
    "priority": "{{ $json.priority }}",
    "campaignId": "{{ $json.campaignId }}",
    "timestamp": "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}"
  }
}
